Name: Third Andurien War
Details: The Third Andurien War was engaged between 2551 to 2556, as move by Chancellor Terence Liao to regain the Andurien worlds lost to  House Marik during the previous Andurien wars. While the CCAF was able to secure some initial victories, the Liao offensives were successfully blunted by ducal and federal forces, turning the war into a stalemate.
